text: Cape Verde has been in every Summer Olympic Games held since 1996. No athletes from Cape Verde have been at any Winter Olympic Games. They have never won a medal. The National Olympic Committee for Cape Verde is Comité Olímpico Caboverdeano. It was started in 1989 and recognized in 1993. ==Related pages== * List of IOC country codes ==References== == Other websites == * Cape Verde profile at London2012.com Category:Sport in Cape Verde Category:Nations at the Olympics
title: Cape Verde at the Olympics
